name: BlazeFury
description:
Jump into your spaceship, equip your most powerful weapons and get ready for the most explosive adventure you've ever lived!

[ADDICTIVE & ORIGINAL GAMEPLAY !]
Break the classic Retro Shooters codes! Take control of your airship 's deadly artillery, swipe your screen to target the enemies aircrafts and make lasers and missiles rain upon them!

[INFINITE CHALLENGE !]
Encounter hordes of enemies and bosses through dozens of worlds!
Break through every challenge, bring freedom upon every planet and test your skill in the ultimate Infinite Zone!

[HUGE CUSTOMIZATION !]
Customize your spaceship thanks to dozens of upgrades and weapons! Collect new ships and optimize your weapon combos to reach the highest score!

[EXPLOSIONS! LOTS OF EXPLOSIONS !]
60 FPS of pure action, gorgeous low-poly design and stunning explosions!
Destroy your enemies in colorful air fights!

[FIERCE COMPETITION !]
The game includes online rankings with no registration required! Challenge other players from all around the world to get the first place!
